description: Try our easy to follow Classic Chocolate Rum Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Chocolate Rum Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup fine desiccated coconut (save 0.5 cup for coating)
1 cup cocoa powder (save 1/2 cup for coating)

recipeInstructions.text: Place biscuits in a food processor and process to make fine crumbs (or crush well in a large zip lock bag with a rolling pin). Transfer crumbs to a mixing bowl. Using a wooden spoon, stir in condensed milk, coconut, cocoa and rum and mix until well combined.
Refrigerate for 1 hour or until cold and firm.
Using damp hands, roll level tablespoons of mixture into balls.
Toss rum balls in your choice of extra coconut, extra cocoa or chocolate sprinkles. Refrigerate in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
